dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is well known as a data set to get started in the field of computer vision, consisting of 60000 32Ã—32 colour images in 10 classes, with 6000 images per class, divided into 50000 training images and 10000 test images.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 is similar to CIFAR-10, but it has 100 classes containing 600 images each, with 500 training images and 100 testing images per class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Y. Netzer
et al.
dcterms:description: SVHN is a real-world image dataset for developing machine learning and object recognition algorithms with minimal requirement on data preprocessing and formatting.
dcterms:title: SVHN
